subdisciplines.name: Culture and Behavior
subdisciplines.description: The study of how cultural and social factors influence individual behavior, emotion, and cognition.

subdisciplines.name: Psychological Trauma
subdisciplines.description: The study of the impact of traumatic experiences on individual psychology and the development of culturally-specific healing practices.

subdisciplines.name: Psychological Anthropology of Religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between religious beliefs and practices, and individual and collective psychology.
